articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of Myanmar
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of Myanmar
						
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, received a message of greeting from Thein Sein, president of Myanmar, on Feb. 4.
					 The message said that he was pleased to extend sincere congratulations to Kim Jong Un, and through him, to the people of the DPRK on behalf of the people of Myanmar and on his own behalf, on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The message sincerely wished Kim Jong Un happiness and the DPRK steady progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Congratulations to PM of Chad
articles.content:
Congratulations to PM of Chad
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim in a message on Wednesday congratulated Djimrangar Dadnadji upon his appointment as prime minister of Chad.
					 The message wished the prime minister big success in his responsible work for achieving the country's stability and economic development.

articles.title: Congratulations to FM of Ghana
articles.content:
Congratulations to FM of Ghana
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Hanna Tetteh upon her appointment as foreign minister of Ghana.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow strong by concerted efforts, the message wished her success in new job.

articles.title: S. Korea Will Have to Pay Dearly for "Sanctions" against KIZ
articles.content:
S. Korea Will Have to Pay Dearly for "Sanctions" against KIZ
						
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the National Economic Cooperation Committee of the DPRK made public the following statement on Wednesday:
					 The puppet Ministry of Unification of south Korea in a business report to "the National Assembly" on Feb. 4 said inspection would be intensified of the things carried into the Kaesong Industrial Zone (KIZ), crying out for an "effective implementation" of the UN "resolution on sanctions against the north" and "corresponding payment be imposed upon the banned goods."
					
					 In this regard the spokesman for the ministry blustered this step would mean that south Korea would remain true to the UN "resolution on sanctions", asserting that the items banned by the UN are possible to find their ways to the north via the KIZ.
					
					 This step is another reckless action to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK and a criminal act of putting the inter-Korean relations into an inescapable collapse.
					
					 As known to everybody, the KIZ, a product of the historic June 15 era of reunification, is a symbol of national reconciliation, unity and cooperation as it was built after the north provided the militarily most sensitive forefront area to the south.
					
					 That is why the KIZ drew great attention of all Koreans and the world and evoked positive response internally and externally since its proclamation.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group, however, has made persistent efforts to remove the KIZ, resorting to vicious moves to deny and violate the north-south joint declarations soon after its seizure of power.
					
					 It worked with bloodshot eyes to stifle the KIZ by limiting or interrupting the entry of south Koreans and the shipment of items particularly whenever the situation got strained.
					
					 The group hamstrung our sincere efforts to revitalize the KIZ, seriously mocking at them and persistently disregarding them.
					
					 It claims that the north greatly benefited from the operations in the KIZ, but it is nothing but a sheer paradox.
					
					 The north offered the KIZ to the south entirely for the sake of national reconciliation, unity and reunification and out of its compatriotic feeling for the minor enterprises and poor people in south Korea.
					
					 It was a resolute step that we provided the whole KIZ of great military importance. Is it possible to properly calculate the action?
					
					 It is something shocking that the ministry looking after "the policy towards the north" and its boss took the lead in kicking up the "sanctions" row.
					
					 The present catastrophic phase is entirely attributable to those elements who stand in the way of inter-Korean relations to escalate the confrontation with compatriots.
					
					 Their trumpeting about "sanctions" against the KIZ is as foolish an act as pricking its own eyes. Its consequences would be unimaginable.
					
					 The group is sadly mistaken if it thinks its "sanctions" against the KIZ will be pressure on the north.
					
					 We hope the KIZ will continue operating in the spirit of the June 15 era of reunification but if someone makes any form of provocation to the KIZ, we will consider it as vicious "sanctions" against us and take such resolute counter-actions as withdrawing all privileges for the KIZ and restoring the area as a military zone.
					
					 In this case the Lee Myung Bak group will be held wholly accountable for the ensuing grave consequences.
					
					 It had better behave itself, keenly aware of the dear price it will have to pay for its reckless "sanctions" against the KIZ.

articles.title: National Seminar to Grasp Kim Jong Il's Revolutionary Career, Exploits Held
articles.content:
National Seminar to Grasp Kim Jong Il's Revolutionary Career, Exploits Held
						
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- A national seminar to grasp the brilliant revolutionary career and immortal exploits of leader Kim Jong Il was held to mark his birth anniversary at the People's Palace of Culture here on Thursday.
					 At the seminar five dissertations were presented. They explained and proved the exploits of Kim Jong Il, who provided the eternal foundation for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche by successfully carrying forward the idea and cause of President Kim Il Sung and turning the DPRK into a political and ideological, military and space power under the banner of Songun.
					
					 Song Ja Rip, president of Kim Il Sung University who doubles as minister of Higher Education, stressed in his speech that Kim Jong Il was the supreme incarnation of loyalty and obligation as he added luster to the 100-year history of Juche Korea with the august name of the President.
					
					 The speaker said that Kim Jong Il held the President in high esteem eternally and glorified socialist Korea as a dignified and invincible power looked up by the world.
					
					 Ri Hye Jong, president of the Academy of Social Sciences, explained that Kim Jong Il developed the President's idea of attaching importance to arms and military affairs into the Songun revolutionary idea and Songun political theory, and formulated and systematized it as the theory for building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Ri Chong Hak, vice-rector of Kim Il Sung Political University, noted that Kim Jong Il was a peerlessly great man who gave a steady continuity to carrying forward and completing the revolutionary cause of Songun.
					
					 O Hye Son, director general and editor-in-chief of the Kumsong Youth Publishing House, said that Kim Jong Il was a peerless patriot who defended the dignity and interests of the country and the nation and provided an eternal foundation for prosperity under the uplifted banner of Songun.
					
					 Cha Yong Myong, principal of Kim Il Sung Higher Party School, underscored the need to hasten the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche, remaining faithful to the ideology and leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Yong Jin, vice-premier of the Cabinet, officials of social organizations, ministries and national institutions, officials of party and power organs and those in the fields of science, education, literature and arts, media, party cadre training and the preservation of revolutionary sites.

articles.title: Jangjasan Revolutionary Site Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
articles.content:
Jangjasan Revolutionary Site Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
						
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Service personnel of the Korean People's Army, people of various circles and school youth and children visit the Jangjasan Revolutionary Site every day in the run-up to the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 Kim Jong Il stayed there in October, Juche 39 (1950) where he hardened his will to beat back the enemies and cultivated patriotism, wishing President Kim Il Sung, who was leading the Fatherland Liberation War to a victory, good health.
					
					 From the beginning of February the number of visitors has reached the daily average of at least 2 000.
					
					 The visitors get a good knowledge of the noble personality of Kim Jong Il, while looking round a house where the peerlessly great man stayed, a small desk, school things, a clock, a timetable and others.
					
					 They also go round two pine-nut trees he planted more than six decades ago, study site, wrestling site, singing site, etc.

articles.title: 10-day Film Show Opened to Mark Day of Shining Star
articles.content:
10-day Film Show Opened to Mark Day of Shining Star
						
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- There opened in the DPRK a 10-day film show to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 In the period of the event, Korean documentaries are to be screened at movie houses and halls of culture all over the country including Pyongyang.
					
					 They include "Under the Guidance of the Great Brilliant Commander", "The Great Leadership for Pushing Back the Frontiers of Science and Technology in Korean Style" and "Shining Star above Mt. Paektu".
					
					 All of them deal with the glorious revolutionary history of Kim Jong Il and his undying feats.
					
					 Such feature films as "Legacy", "White Gem", "Wish" and "Comrade Kim Goes Flying" will also be screened. 
					
					 An opening ceremony took place at the People's Palace of Culture Thursday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam and officials concerned, creators and artistes in the field of movie art and Pyongyangites.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony, they watched a documentary "Building a Socialist Paradise in the Era of Songun".
					
					 Similar events took place in every province on the same day.

articles.title: DPRK People Inspired by Kim Jong Un's Important Decision
articles.content:
DPRK People Inspired by Kim Jong Un's Important Decision
						
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- It was recently announced that the dear respected Kim Jong Un, at an enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea, made an important decision which serves as guidelines for defending the security and sovereignty of the country.
					 The news has hardened the will of the people in the DPRK to remain faithful to his Songun (military-first) leadership.
					
					 Rim Chol, a teacher of Kim Il Sung University, told KCNA:
					
					 History shows that military strength is decisive of victory in the revolution.
					
					 It is the truth that any nation weak in military muscle can never defend its sovereignty and right to existence but fall a victim to the arbitrariness of the imperialists.
					
					 That was why President Kim Il Sung began the Korean revolution with arms to liberate the country from the Japanese colonial rule and attached priority to increasing the military force all his life.
					
					 Regarding it as his lifelong mission to accomplish the Songun revolutionary cause pioneered by the President, leader Kim Jong Il further strengthened the armed forces of the DPRK with his extraordinary wisdom, distinguished commanding art and matchless grit.
					
					 With the Songun policy, he creditably deterred the U.S.-led imperialists' moves to stifle socialism in the DPRK and turned the country into a world-level military power.
					
					 It is the firm belief of the Korean army and people that the country's prosperity and the happiness of posterity lie in upholding the Songun politics under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Yong Hui, an official of the Ministry of Forestry, said:
					
					 The news about Kim Jong Un's important decision has instilled courage and optimism into my mind.
					
					 I'd love to express best regards and highest glory to him, who is bolstering up the country's military strength, true to the intention of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Building-materials Shop in Pyongyang Draws Many Customers
articles.content:
Building-materials Shop in Pyongyang Draws Many Customers
						
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The Building-materials Direct Sales Shop under the Ministry of Construction and Building-Materials Industry is now drawing a large number of customers with various kinds of quality commodities.
					 The shop, located in Changjon Street of Pyongyang, began its operation on September 1, Juche 52 (1963).
					
					 Pyon Myong Hui, manager of the shop, told KCNA:
					
					 "The shop sells more than 50 kinds of building parts produced by the Sunchon Cement Complex, Taean Friendship Glass Factory, Nampho Glassware Factory and other industrial establishments in the field of building-materials production.
					
					 Those building parts are popular among customers as all of them are of high quality and very useful. Customers are satisfied with diverse and quality home-made products.
					
					 The commodities on sale at the shop include building parts, general merchandise, furniture, glassware and various shapes of natural stone-made products, which are helpful to improving the life environment in dwelling houses and public places."
					
					 The shop properly carries on ordered service for the convenience of customers.

articles.title: Stamps Mark Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary
articles.content:
Stamps Mark Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary
						
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea issued new stamps (two sheets and individuals) to celebrate the Day of the Shining Star (Feb. 16), the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Printed in the sheets are letters reading "In commemoration of the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il's birthday", "Juche 31 (1942)-Juche 102 (2013)" and "2.16". Seen in them are a photo of Kim Jong Il in his Kim Il Sung University days, a photo of him with his parents, as well as pictures of his birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp, Jong Il Peak and Ryongnam Hill. 
					
					 Carried in individual stamps are a picture of Kim Jong Il forming the "Group for the Study of General Kim Il Sung's Biography" and a picture of the leader in his childhood.
					
					 The stamps show how Kim Jong Il cultivated his qualification and traits as leader to carry forward the revolutionary cause of President Kim Il Sung after his birth as the son of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Marble Desk Lamp, Gift to Kim Jong Il from Raul Castro
articles.content:
Marble Desk Lamp, Gift to Kim Jong Il from Raul Castro
						
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The exhibits at the International Friendship Exhibition House in the DPRK include a marble desk lamp which was presented to leader Kim Jong Il by Raul Castro Ruz, president of the Council of State of Cuba, on May 6, Juche 86 (1997).
					 Raul Castro was deeply moved by Kim Jong Il's celebrated works on scientific accuracy of socialism and inevitability of its victory and decided to present the lamp as a gift to him when a Cuban delegation was visiting the DPRK.
					
					 With this present he wished that Kim Jong Il, the brilliant Songun (military-first) commander and master of ideology and theory, would render greater service to the human cause of independence, the cause of socialism.
					
					 The marble desk lamp consists of hemispheric shade, indicative of globe, and prop and electric wire.
					
					 Carved in relief on the shade rim, four by four, are broad leaves of the oldest ever-green tree in Cuba.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Condemns UNSC Bereft of Impartiality
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Condemns UNSC Bereft of Impartiality
						
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- It is none other than the U.S. and the UN Security Council dancing to its tune that are chiefly responsible for the touch-and-go situation prevailing  on the Korean Peninsula, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a bylined article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is just a few days after the "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK was fabricated at the UNSC that the U.S. and other countries carried out missile interceptor tests and Japan launched a spy satellite, military acts of posing a threat to peace and security.
					
					 The UNSC made much fuss over the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes but refused to take up the above-said acts.
					
					 These contradictory facts compel the DPRK to question the UNSC.
					
					ã€€Is this a fair attitude for peace and security? Why does it keep mum about the missile tests and the launch of a spy satellite of those countries which threaten them so much.
					
					 They claim they are allowed to conduct nuclear tests and launch long-range missiles but the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes poses a threat to global peace and security. This logic is brigandish and unreasonable.
					
					The UNSC has been reduced to a marionette of the U.S. for which some of its permanent members are to blame.
					
					  If powers claim they are allowed to enjoy privileges and conduct high-handed practices while small countries should obey them and fall victim to them, such world cannot but be the one based on the jungle law.
					
					 This goes to clearly prove once again the justice of the demand of the world people for reforming the anachronistic UNSC. 
					
					 The UNSC should draw a serious lesson from this situation, concludes the article.

articles.title: North-targeted U.S. Reckless Saber-rattling Assailed
articles.content:
North-targeted U.S. Reckless Saber-rattling Assailed 
						
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Some time ago, the U.S. warlike forces conducted an interceptor missile test in the central coastal area of California State. 
					 Meanwhile, the U.S. warmongers are going to deploy B-2 Stealth bombers on Guam. 
					
					 The U.S. authorities do not hide the fact that these bombers are aimed to make "precision strike" at the nuclear and missile bases of the DPRK in "contingency" on the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is "precaution" made by those who were frightened by the statement of the DPRK National Defence Commission and revelation of their reckless war hysteria to ignite a war against the DPRK in the worst case.
					
					 These ill-boding U.S. military moves for "precision strike" at the strategic targets of the DPRK go to clearly prove that its hostile policy entered the dangerous phase.
					
					 The situation on the Korean Peninsula is inching close to the brink of war due to the U.S. imperialists' persistent anti-DPRK acts and scenario for preemptive attack on it. 
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK can never remain a passive onlooker to the situation in which the sovereignty of the nation is violated and the security of the country faces a grave threat. 
					
					 Now that the U.S. hostile moves have gone beyond the limit and its nuclear threat is increasing, the people are calling for actions for defending the sovereignty of the country stronger than a nuclear test. 
					
					 It is quite natural and just that the DPRK's all measures for bolstering up deterrence are targeted against the U.S., the sworn enemy of the Korean people.
					
					 Those who dare challenge the just cause of the DPRK will be unable to escape merciless blows of the army of Songun.

articles.title: U.S. Accused of Its Dangerous War Policy and Arms Buildup
articles.content:
U.S. Accused of Its Dangerous War Policy, Arms Buildup
						
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the U.S. conducted a test of a mini-bomb for F-35 pursuit plane.
					 The bomb is capable of adjusting its flight track, hitting ever-changing targets and ensuring high precision strike at moving objects from long distance.
					
					 It was reported that the U.S. Department of Defense spent nearly 0.7 billion dollars for the development of the bomb. 
					
					 Earlier, the U.S. tested a super-blockbuster with an aim to "destroy nuclear facilities" of its rival side.
					
					 Minju Joson Thursday in a bylined commentary observes in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. pretends to be interested in peace, talking about "detente" and "arms reduction" but such bomb test more clearly indicates that it is pursuing a sinister purpose in actuality.
					
					 It is the contention of the U.S. that it can maintain its status as "the only super power" only when it presses other countries by force and overpowers them militarily. From this viewpoint, it is going in the direction of stepping up the development of new-type weapons despite pressure for budget cut-down.
					
					 The international situation still remains unstable and peace is seriously disturbed in various parts of the world. This is mainly attributable to the military confrontation policy and arms buildup of the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. is busy giving spurs to maintaining and bolstering up its military muscle and developing latest weapons. This is driving the world into a pitfall of arms race. And this amounts to a serious challenge to the world peace and development. The nightmare of arms race dating back to the Cold War era is reviving today due to the U.S. arms buildup. 
					
					 All facts go to clearly prove that the U.S. is, indeed, an arch criminal disturbing world peace and stability and a chieftain of arms race.

articles.title: S. Korean Heavyweight's Anti-DPRK Remarks Assailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Heavyweight's Anti-DPRK Remarks Assailed
						
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Chon Yong U, chief of diplomacy and security in Chongwadae of south Korea, recently made such reckless remarks that it is necessary to force the north to abandon its nuclear program, adding that the best way for carrying it out is to tighten the "sanctions" to "such level that the north cannot hold off".
					 Minju Joson Thursday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 The base intention of the south Korean puppet group to realize its ambition to invade the DPRK after disarming it in collusion with outsiders was clearly revealed through Chon's remarks.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. which compelled the DPRK to have access to nukes.
					
					 The group is obliged to thank the DPRK for deterring a war and saving south Korea from death, but the group is crying out for the dismantlement of the nukes which have firmly defended the peace and security on the Korean Peninsula. What a senseless rhetoric it is.
					
					 The group seems to think that it can frighten the DPRK by applying sanctions. But it is a foolish daydream of a stupid who is completely ignorant of the DPRK.
					
					 Chon's provocative remarks are clearly aimed at deliberately getting on the nerves of the DPRK and driving the situation into the worst phase in order to unleash a war against it.
					
					 He is just the same confrontation fanatic as traitor Lee Myung Bak.
					
					 As such guy is in charge of the diplomacy and security of the Lee regime, the inter-Korean ties are plunging into deadlock.
					
					 All the Koreans will never pardon such traitors as Lee and Chon as they committed unpardonable crimes by doing only things harmful to the country and the nation.

articles.title: Capitalism Goes to Ruin Due to Its Crisis: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Capitalism Goes to Ruin Due to Its Crisis: Rodong Sinmun 
						
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The imperialists are now going to ruin due to a serious financial crisis, Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a bylined article says.
					 It goes on:
					
					 There has never been such financial crisis that plunged the Western world into horror and greatly threatened the capitalist system since the 1929-1933 serious economic crises.
					
					 The U.S. and other Western countries have made desperate efforts to overcome the financial crisis but they can never bring capitalist socio-political and economic contradictions and crises based on monopoly and colonial domination under control no matter what line they choose. 
					
					 As financial oligarchy is enforced in the U.S. and other Western countries, all domestic and foreign policies are shaped to meet the interests of a small number of big financial capitalists and they fully serve the purpose of satisfying them. 
					
					 The capitalists are rushing headlong into aggression and war with state power involved in order to weather the worsening politico-economic crises and gratify their ever-increasing greed. 
					
					 The financial deficit is going up to the maximum in the capitalist countries because of a stupendous amount of state funds spent for wars and deployment of aggression forces in the occupied areas, development of WMDs, etc. National bonds are issued at random to make up for financial deficits, etc., increasing state debts to an uncontrollable phase. 
					
					 The U.S. together with Western countries is going on with military operations in Afghanistan and other Mideast countries. The funds they are spending still now are enormous. Consequently, the national debts and financial deficits will steadily increase and further deepen all sorts of politico-economic, social and class contradictions. 
					
					 What is clear is that there is no way out for the imperialist countries to get rid of their serious political and economic crises unless their capitalist system and hegemonic policy are brought to an end.

articles.title: Exercise of Right to Peaceful Use of Space Is Battle for Defending Sovereignty: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Exercise of Right to Peaceful Use of Space Is Battle for Defending Sovereignty: KCNA Commentary
						
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The U.S.-masterminded adoption of "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK over its successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 made the army and people of the DPRK to turn out in a do-or-die battle for defending the country's sovereignty.
					 The U.S. and its allies wantonly violated the independent right of a sovereign state to develop space. This hostile act is an indication of the inveterate repugnance and hostility toward the ideology and social system in the DPRK.
					
					 Defending the right to the peaceful use of space is not just an issue pertaining to the right to develop space but an issue related to the destiny as it is one for defending the sovereignty and achieving the prosperity of the country and the nation.
					
					 Sovereignty is what keeps dignified Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea alive.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK have never allowed the nation's sovereignty to be encroached upon and the supreme interests of the nation infringed on.
					
					 They have bolstered the national defence capabilities and firmly safeguarded the gains of socialism defying the U.S.-led imperialists' ever-more undisguised moves to isolate and stifle the country.
					
					 We can never forget the grief Korea suffered as a weak nation a century ago which left a deep scar in the nation's history.
					
					 Clear is the aim sought by the hostile forces in stepping up rhetoric against the DPRK.
					
					 They seek to break the independent stand of the DPRK and force it to take down the socialist banner.
					
					 A single step backward will rid the DPRK of its right to existence, to say nothing of building a thriving country.
					
					 Satellites and long-range rockets to be launched by the DPRK in the future will become the struggle of a new higher stage in defending the sovereignty of the Korean people.
					
					 There is no reason whatsoever to have repugnance against the DPRK's efforts to explore space with its own strength, technology and wisdom.
					
					 The DPRK is at the crossroad of whether it leaves its sovereignty to be encroached upon by the U.S. which found fault with the DPRK's peaceful satellite launch or it demonstrates its dignity as a space power. So, the army and people of the DPRK are now feeling surging anger at the U.S. 
					
					 It is quite natural that the DPRK's efforts of building an economic giant, its struggle for conquering space and its measure of bolstering deterrence for defending the country's peace and security will all orientate toward the all-out action targeting the U.S.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will surely win a victory as they are advancing along the road of justice to defend the sovereignty with firm conviction in the justice of their cause.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Accused of His Crime-woven Office
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Accused of His Crime-woven Office 
						
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Public comment on the five years' office of traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea was critical, according to Voice of People, an internet broadcasting service of south Korea on Monday.
					 According to the opinion poll conducted by a survey institution on Sunday, majority of the respondents said that the present chief executive's state administration was very wrong.
					
					 They cited projects to improve four large rivers, unreasonable policy on personnel affair, scandals, reduction of jobs, economic crisis, collapse of the inter-Korean relations, etc. as major reasons for such wrong administration.
					
					 They described the recent "special amnesty" granted to Choe Si Jung, former chairman of the Broadcasting and News Agency Committee, and others as a "pardon" made for his relatives and confidants in "return for their favor".

articles.title: S. Korean Internet Paper Denounces Authorities
articles.content:
S. Korean Internet Paper Denounces Authorities
						
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Thongil News on February 4 disclosed the reckless moves of the south Korean consulate general in Osaka, Japan of hampering the efforts of Koreans in Japan to solve the issue of aiding Korean schools in Japan.
					 A consul of the consulate general in Osaka on January 23 threatened a Korean in Japan to "stop the activity for aiding Korean schools in Japan."
					
					 He even let loose the rhetoric that "to aid Korean schools is to aid the organization of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan" and "as it is violation of the security law, you may be investigated when you go to south Korea."
					
					 Now in Japan even many Japanese join Koreans in holding meetings and mass movement for defending the education and other rights of Koreans in protest against the Japanese government's discrimination policy regarding the system for aiding Korean schools.
					
					 Reporting about such facts, the paper denounced the puppet group for its unjust step of preventing a solution to the issue for aiding Korean schools and subjecting it to suppression.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Declares Large-scale Action for Settlement of Labor Issues
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Declares Large-scale Action for Settlement of Labor Issues
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The Emergency Situation Council for Urgently Coping with Lay-off, Part-time Job and Destruction of Trade Unions in south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on Tuesday and declared a large-scale February actions of workers, according to CBS of south Korea.
					 The organization at the conference urged the authorities to take care of the labor issues such as the withdrawal of layoff and retraction of the part-time job for members of Hanjin Heavy Industry, Ssangyong Motors and Hyundai Motors unions.
					
					 The large-scale actions would continue till the demands of trade unions are met, the organization stressed.
					
					 Meanwhile, the All-People Measure Committee of Ssangyong Motor held a press conference in Seoul on the same day at which it declared that it would fight it out for the settlement of the Ssangyong Motor's situation.

articles.title: Earthquake Jolts S. Korea
articles.content:
Earthquake Jolts S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- An earthquake measuring 3.5 degrees on the Richter scale jolted Kochang County, South Kyongsang Province on February 5, according to the south Korean MBC.
					 Tremors were felt in some areas of South and North Jolla, South and North Kyongsang and South and North Chungchong provinces, the report said.

articles.title: TB Serious in S. Korea
articles.content:
TB Serious in S. Korea 
						
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Tuberculosis has become a serious problem in south Korea, according to south Korean KBS on Feb. 4.
					 The result of analysis of a WHO report by the Headquarters for Management of Diseases showed that south Korea tops the world list of the occurrence and mortality from tuberculosis as well as the number of tuberculosis patients.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Highly Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Highly Praised Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Foreign figures highly praised the exploits of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The coordinator of the Democratic Congolese Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said in a statement on January 24:
					
					 The wise leadership of Kim Jong Il greatly inspired the peoples of all countries struggling against domination and interference of the imperialists and for freedom and independence.
					
					 He, who fully embodied President Kim Il Sung's idea of believing in the people as in Heaven, devoted his all to their happiness all his life.
					
					 The DPRK could emerge a full-fledged nuclear weapons state and satellite launcher thanks to Kim Jong Il, who firmly defended the sovereignty of the country with Songun politics.
					
					 The great exploits performed by him in carrying out the Korean revolution and accomplishing the cause of global independence will shine long and they will always be remembered by progressive mankind.
					
					 Manju Ratna Sakya, chairman of the Nepal Journalist Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Politics, in a statement on January 30 noted:
					
					 The great miracles worked by the DPRK at present are the brilliant fruition of the exploits performed by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The world should learn the immortal Juche idea founded by Kim Il Sung and the unique Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, said in a statement on February 1 that the world people aspiring after socialism are all out in the just struggle, drawing great conviction and courage from socialist Korea led by Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: British Organization Praises Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
British Organization Praises Kim Jong Un
						
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted an article headlined "Leader Kim Jong Un's smile" and a photo of him among delegates to the celebrations of the 66th anniversary of the Korean Children's Union on its website on Jan. 30.
					 The beaming image of Kim Jong Un, leader of the DPRK, is seen very often in world media, the article said, and went on:
					
					 His smile is attracting many people across the world, indeed.
					
					 His smile represents the personality of a great father embracing the people and offering them love and affection.
					
					 He always meets anyone anywhere and any time with a broad smile.
					
					 He strokes the cheeks of children and hears their whispers.
					
					 He has peculiar photos taken together with ordinary soldiers and people arms in arms. 
					
					 He always stresses the need to put the interests of the people above anything else and gives them top priority and devotes everything to them.
					
					 His smile reflects his belief that it is quite possible to build the DPRK into a thriving socialist country before long.
					
					 He said it is the firm determination of the Workers' Party of Korea to make the people lead a wealthy life under socialism to their heart's content, not suffering difficulties again.
					
					 His smile represents the pluck of the strong convinced of the final victory in the confrontation with the imperialists.
					
					 He, his face beaming with a broad smile, inspected the island defence detachments stationed in the biggest hotspot aboard a small wooden boat without any escort ship when the U.S. and south Korea were staging a dangerous joint military exercise. This calm and composed image left unforgettable impressions on many people of the world.
					
					 Only shining victory will be in store for the Korean people thanks to the broad smile of the leader.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Ethiopia
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Ethiopia
						
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was inaugurated in Ethiopia on January 31.
					 Nigatu Dagnachew, chairman of the Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It decided to organize diverse political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il in the period between February 1 and 20.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Indonesia
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Indonesia
						
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was inaugurated in Indonesia on February 1.
					 Nurdin Purnomo, chairman of the National Leading Council of the Diversity Party of Indonesia, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It set the period from February 4 to 16 as a celebration period and decided to organize diverse political and cultural events.
					
					 The chairman of the preparatory committee at the inaugural ceremony praised Kim Jong Il as a great leader who made an outstanding contribution to the cause of global peace and independence.
					
					 He stressed that it is natural to celebrate the birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il as a world holiday.

articles.title: French Political Party, Ecuadorian Organization Slam UN "Resolution" against DPRK
articles.content:
French Political Party, Ecuadorian Organization Slam UN "Resolution" against DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- A French political party and an Ecuadorian public organization issued statements in denunciation of the UN Security Council's "resolution" against the DPRK.
					 The French Revolutionary Communist League on Jan. 30 stated:
					
					 The DPRK succeeded in launching satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 by its own efforts and with its indigenous technology.
					
					 This satellite is for peaceful purposes as it helps develop science and technology in the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. and its followers, however, persistently denied this fact and cooked up the unjust "resolution on sanctions" at the UN Security Council and are busy kicking up a campaign against the DPRK.
					
					 We vehemently condemn the arrogant acts of the U.S. and its followers blocking the development of sovereign states.
					
					 The world progressive and peace-loving forces and anti-imperialist independent forces are called upon to turn out in the campaign for denouncing and frustrating the high-handed practices and aggression moves of the imperialist allied forces in violation of the sovereign rights and dignity of other countries, keenly aware that the world peace and stability are put at great peril by the U.S. and its allies.
					
					 An Ecuadorian public organization on Jan. 31 condemned all sorts of sanctions slapped against the DPRK by the forces opposed to its legitimate policy on successful space development.
					
					 The organization voiced opposition to any attempt to violate the sovereignty and the right to self-determination of the Korean people and called for defending the world peace.

articles.title: Funeral Service for Cambodian Great King Norodom Sihanouk Held
articles.content:
Funeral Service for Cambodian Great King Norodom Sihanouk Held
						
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- A farewell ceremony for Great King Norodom Sihanouk took place in Phnom Penh, Cambodia on Feb. 1.
					 Attending the ceremony were King Norodom Sihamoni, Great Queen Norodom Monineath Sihanouk, President of the Senate Chea Sim, President of the National Assembly Heng Samlin, Prime Minister Hun Sen and one million people from all walks of life.
					
					 Amidst the boom of a gun salute, the funeral car left the Royal Palace led by the flag of the King and the honor guards. It was driven through streets before arriving at the ornate crematorium structure built at Veal Preah Meru.
					
					 The funeral service for the Great King took place there on Feb. 4.

articles.title: CCEN advierte al Sur de Corea por su "sancion" sobre Zona Industrial de Kaesong
articles.content:
CCEN advierte al Sur de Corea por su "sancion" sobre Zona Industrial de Kaesong
Pyongyang, 7 de febrero (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite de Colaboracion de Economia Nacional (CCEN) hizo publica el dia 6 la siguiente declaracion: 
					El pasado dia 4, el Ministerio de Unificacion del Sur de Corea al presentar el informe de su trabajo ante la "Asamblea Nacional" manifesto abiertamente que "cumplira eficientemente" la "resolucion de sancion sobre el Norte de Corea" de la ONU, "asignara el precio merecido" e intensificara la revision sobre los materiales que se introducen en la Zona Industrial de Kaesong. 
					
					Al respecto, el vocero del Ministerio de Unificacion del Sur de Corea dijo abiertamente que tales medidas se toman para ser fiel a la "resolucion de sancion" de la ONU.
					
					La banda titere trata de intensificar el registro sobre los materiales que se introducen en la Zona Industrial de Kaesong abusando de la "resolucion" de la ONU, lo que es un proceder conflictivo anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y un crimen antinacional que lleva a la fase mas catastrofica las relaciones intercoreanas. 
					
					Como esta conocido por todo el mundo, la Zona Industrial de Kaesong es el fruto de la historica era de reunificacion del 15 de Junio y simbolo de la reconciliacion, unidad y cooperacion nacionales porque le concedimos al Sur de Corea esta zona militarmente muy tensa situada en la primera linea del frente. 
					
					Por esta razon, desde el primer dia de su creacion, la Zona Industrial de Kaesong atrajo gran atencion de toda la nacion y el mundo y provoco buenas repercusiones dentro y fuera del pais. 
					
					Pero, tan pronto como tomo el poder, la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak nego y extermino las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur y se desespero tenazmente por eliminar la Zona Industrial de Kaesong. Y siempre que se creaba la situacion tensa, restringia e impedia la entrada del personal y materiales del Sur de Corea con el fin de asfixiar la zona industrial.
					
					La banda traidora dio espaldas y obstaculizo los esfuerzos de la RPDC por activar la gestion de la Zona Industrial de Kaesong. 
					
					Sueltan las palabras absurdas como si la RPDC se beneficiara mucho de esta zona. 
					
					Concedimos la Zona Industrial de Kaesong para la reconciliacion, la unidad y la reunificacion y con el sentimiento fraternal por las empresas pequenas y medianas y los habitantes pobres del Sur de Corea. 
					
					Lo mas estupefacto es que al frente de la campana de "sancion" anti-RPDC estan el Ministerio de Unificacion y su titular que auspician la "politica sobre el Norte". 
					
					Tales tipejos enloquecidos por la confrontacion fratricida impiden las relaciones intercoreanas y trajeron la situacion catastrofica de hoy. 
					
					La "sancion" sobre la Zona Industrial de Kaesong sera un acto igual a caer en su propia trampa y traera las consecuencias indecibles. 
					
					Seria un calculo absurdo si los titeres surcoreanos piensan en que podrian ejercer la presion a la RPDC con la "sancion" sobre la Zona Industrial de Kaesong.
					
					Deseamos mantener la Zona Industrial de Kaesong en el principio de observar el espiritu de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio. Pero, si uno quiere abusarla para su mala intencion aun en lo minimo y en cualquier forma, lo consideraremos como una "sancion" anti-RPDC y tomaremos las contramedidas rotundas de retirar todos los privilegios en esta zona y convertirla  otra vez en una region militar. 
					
					La responsabilidad por el respecto recaera enteramente sobre la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak. 
					
					Los traidores surcoreanos deben actuar con prudencia dandose clara cuenta de la grave consecuencia que se emane de su imprudente "sancion" sobre la Zona Industrial de Kaesong.

articles.title: Simposio central para asimilar la vida y hazanas de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Simposio central para asimilar la vida y hazanas de Kim Jong Il
						
Pyongyang, 7 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del dia de nacimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il (16 de febrero) tuvo lugar el dia 7 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el simposio central para asimilar la vida y hazanas revolucionarias del Dirigente.
					En la ocasion fueron publicadas 5 disertaciones que argumentaron las hazanas del Dirigente quien asento el eterno cimiento para el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, al llevar adelante la idea y la causa del Presidente Kim Il Sung y convertir la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en una potencia ideo-politica, militar y cosmica bajo la bandera del Songun.
					
					En su intervencion, Song Ja Rip, rector de la Universidad Kim Il Sung y ministro de Educacion Superior, subrayo que el Dirigente glorifico la centuria de Corea de Juche que lleva el nombre del Presidente, lo que devino la maxima personificacion de fidelidad y obligacion moral.
					
					Menciono que enaltecio para siempre al Presidente y convirtio la Corea socialista en la digna potencia a que admira todo el mundo.
					
					La presidenta de la Academia de Ciencias Sociales, Ri Hye Jong explico que el Dirigente profundizo la idea del Presidente de dar importancia al fusil, al asunto militar, como idea revolucionaria y teoria politica, del Songun, y la sistematizo como una teoria de construccion de un Estado prospero socialista.
					
					Ri Chong Hak, vicerrector de la Universidad Politica Kim Il Sung, subrayo que el Dirigente es el gran hombre sin precedente quien preparo la garantia para llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Songun.
					
					O Hye Son, presidenta y redactora en jefe de la Editorial de la Juventud Kumsong, destaco que el Dirigente es el gran patriotico quien bajo la bandera del Songun defendio la dignidad y el beneficio de la patria y la nacion y preparo el cimiento eterno de la prosperidad.
					
					Cha Yong Myong, director de la Escuela Superior del Partido Kim Il Sung, recalco que deben adelantar la victoria final de la causa revolucionaria de Juche siguiendo con fidelidad la idea y la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Asistieron a la ocasion el secretario del Comite Central del PTC Kim Ki Nam, el vicepremier Kim Yong Jin y otros funcionarios de entidades sociales, los ministerios y organos centrales, instituciones del partido y el Poder de esta capital y de las ramas de la ciencia, la educacion, literatura y arte, prensa e informacion, organos de formacion de los cuadros del partido y de historia revolucionaria.

articles.title: Lugar de interes historico-revolucionario del monte Jangja
articles.content:
Lugar de interes historico-revolucionario del monte Jangja 
						
Pyongyang, 7 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del dia de natalicio del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, trabajadores, jovenes y ninos escolares visitan cada dia el lugar de interes historico-revolucionario del monte Jangja. 
					En octubre del 39 (1950) de la Era Juche, el Dirigente estuvo en ese lugar durante mas de 20 dias deseando buena salud del Presidente Kim Il Sung, quien conducia a la victoria la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria. 
					
					En febrero el numero de visitantes alcanza a 2 mil como promedio diario. 
					
					Ellos pasan revista a la historica casa donde pasaba el Dirigente, la mesa, los articulos escolares, el reloj, el horario y otros usados por el. 
					
					  Tambien recorren dos pinos pinoneros que transmiten la inolvidable historia de hace 60 anos, el sitio de estudio, el de sirum, el de divulgacion de cancion y otros lugares historicos.

articles.title: ACNC defiende derecho al uso del cosmos con fines pacificos
articles.content:
ACNC defiende derecho al uso del cosmos con fines pacificos
						
Pyongyang, 7 de febrero (ACNC) -- La adopcion de la "resolucion de sancion" anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en torno al exitoso lanzamiento de la unidad no.2 de satelite artificial "Kwangmyongsong-3" empuja al ejercito y pueblo coreanos a movilizarse en la batalla decisiva para defender su soberania.
					El presente acto hostil de Estados Unidos y sus seguidores viola flagrantemente el derecho de un Estado soberano al desarrollo del cosmos, siendo una muestra de acostumbrado veto a la idea y al regimen de la RPDC.
					
					Defender el derecho referido no es un simple problema sobre el desarrollo del cosmos sino la cuestion vital para defender la soberania y lograr la prosperidad del pais y la nacion.
					
					La independencia es la vida para la digna nacion de Kim Il Sung, la Corea de Kim Jong Il.
					
					Los uniformados y civiles coreanos no toleran nunca que fuera violada su soberania nacional o sean perjudicados los maximos intereses del pais.
					
					Anteriormente, el pueblo coreano consolido el poderio de defensa nacional y defendio fidedignamente las conquistas del socialismo frustrando la creciente campana de Estados Unidos y otros imperialistas para aislar y aplastar a la RPDC.
					
					El no puede olvidar nunca las indecibles tristezas que ha sufrido hace un siglo por ser una nacion debil.
					
					La meta que persiguen los enemigos es doblegar el espiritu independiente del pueblo coreano y obligarle a bajar la bandera del socialismo.
					
					Si la RPDC retrocede un paso, sera privado del derecho a la existencia, lejos de desarrollarse como Estado prospero.
					
					Los satelites artificiales y los cohetes de largo alcance a lanzar sucesivamente seran la lucha de nueva y elevada etapa para la defensa de soberania del pueblo coreano.
					
					No existe ninguna razon para negar selectivamente los esfuerzos de la RPDC por explotar el cosmos con las fuerzas, tecnologias e inteligencias propias.
					
					Ahora, la RPDC se encuentra en la encrucijada de tolerar la violacion de su soberania por parte de EE.UU. o mantener su dignidad como potencia espacial.
					
					Es natural que la construccion de potencia economica, la lucha por conquistar el cosmos y la consolidacion del disuasivo para defender la paz y seguridad del pais se orienten al enfrentamiento total contra el imperio yanqui.
					
					Es definitiva la victoria del ejercito y pueblo de la RPDC que marchan por el justo camino de defensa de la soberania, convencidos de la justeza de su causa.
